meanings.definition: A person who specializes in typing.
meanings.sent1: The typiest in the office can type very fast.
meanings.sent2: She hired the typiest to help with her typing workload.
meanings.sent3: The typiest always has the neatest desk with all the typing tools.
meanings.sent4: He was the typiest fingers in the west, winning every typing competition.
meanings.sent5: The typiest's accuracy and speed make them stand out in the typing world.

meanings.sent1: The typiest software for writers is easy to use.
meanings.sent2: Her typiest skills helped her finish the report quickly.
meanings.sent3: The typiest keyboard in the store had all the latest features.
meanings.sent4: His typiest touch on the keys made the music flow beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The typiest font for the project was chosen to enhance readability.

meanings.sent1: His typiest was interrupted by a phone call.
meanings.sent2: Typing speed is an important factor in improving your typiest.
meanings.sent3: The typiest can sometimes lead to sore fingers if done for too long.
meanings.sent4: In the digital age, the typiest has become a crucial skill for many.
meanings.sent5: Her typiest was so loud that it echoed through the office.
